trans-unit.source: Gem dependencies inside an engine should be specified inside the .gemspec file at the root of the engine. The reason is that the engine may be installed as a gem. If dependencies were to be specified inside the Gemfile, these would not be recognized by a traditional gem install and so they would not be installed, causing the engine to malfunction.
trans-unit.target: 引擎内部的宝石依赖关系应在引擎根目录的 .gemspec 文件中指定。原因是引擎可能安装为宝石。如果要在 Gemfile 中指定依赖项，则传统的gem安装将无法识别这些依赖项，因此将无法安装它们，从而导致引擎发生故障。

trans-unit.source: Guesses the table name (in forced lower-case) based on the name of the class in the inheritance hierarchy descending directly from ActiveRecord::Base. So if the hierarchy looks like: Reply < Message < ActiveRecord::Base, then Message is used to guess the table name even when called on Reply. The rules used to do the guess are handled by the Inflector class in Active Support, which knows almost all common English inflections. You can add new inflections in config/initializers/inflections.rb.
trans-unit.target: 根据继承层次结构中直接从ActiveRecord :: Base继承的类的名称来猜测表名（强制小写）。因此，如果层次结构看起来像：Reply <Message < ActiveRecord :: Base，那么即使在Reply上调用，Message也会用来猜测表名称。用于进行猜测的规则由Active Support中的Inflector类处理，该类几乎了解所有常见的英语变形。您可以在config / initializers / inflections.rb中添加新的变形。

trans-unit.source: HTTP basic authentication is an authentication scheme that is supported by the majority of browsers and other HTTP clients. As an example, consider an administration section which will only be available by entering a username and a password into the browser's HTTP basic dialog window. Using the built-in authentication is quite easy and only requires you to use one method, http_basic_authenticate_with.
trans-unit.target: HTTP基本身份验证是大多数浏览器和其他HTTP客户端支持的身份验证方案。例如，考虑一个管理部分，只有在浏览器的HTTP基本对话框窗口中输入用户名和密码后，该管理部分才可用。使用内置身份验证非常容易，只需要使用一种方法 http_basic_authenticate_with 即可。

trans-unit.source: HTTP digest authentication is superior to the basic authentication as it does not require the client to send an unencrypted password over the network (though HTTP basic authentication is safe over HTTPS). Using digest authentication with Rails is quite easy and only requires using one method, authenticate_or_request_with_http_digest.
trans-unit.target: HTTP摘要身份验证优于基本身份验证，因为它不需要客户端通过网络发送未加密的密码（尽管HTTP基本身份验证通过HTTPS是安全的）。在Rails中使用摘要式身份验证非常容易，只需要使用一种方法 authenticate_or_request_with_http_digest 即可。

trans-unit.source: HTTP request headers have a Referer, User-Agent (client software), and Cookie field, among others. Response headers for example have a status code, Cookie, and Location (redirection target URL) field. All of them are user-supplied and may be manipulated with more or less effort. Remember to escape these header fields, too. For example when you display the user agent in an administration area.
trans-unit.target: HTTP请求标头具有Referer，User-Agent（客户端软件）和Cookie字段等。响应头例如具有状态码，Cookie和位置（重定向目标URL）字段。它们都是由用户提供的，可以或多或少地进行操作。记住也要转义这些标题字段。例如，当您在管理区域中显示用户代理时。

trans-unit.source: Having one single place in the admin interface or Intranet, where the input has not been sanitized, makes the entire application vulnerable. Possible exploits include stealing the privileged administrator's cookie, injecting an iframe to steal the administrator's password or installing malicious software through browser security holes to take over the administrator's computer.
trans-unit.target: 在管理界面或Intranet中,有一个地方的输入没有经过消毒,就会使整个应用程序变得脆弱。可能的漏洞包括窃取特权管理员的cookie,注入iframe窃取管理员的密码,或者通过浏览器安全漏洞安装恶意软件接管管理员的电脑。

trans-unit.source: Here we're using link_to in a different way. We pass the named route as the second argument, and then the options as another argument. The method: :delete and data: { confirm: 'Are you sure?' } options are used as HTML5 attributes so that when the link is clicked, Rails will first show a confirm dialog to the user, and then submit the link with method delete. This is done via the JavaScript file rails-ujs which is automatically included in your application's layout (app/views/layouts/application.html.erb) when you generated the application. Without this file, the confirmation dialog box won't appear.
trans-unit.target: 在这里，我们以不同的方式使用 link_to 。我们将命名路由作为第二个参数，然后将选项作为另一个参数。该 method: :delete 和 data: { confirm: 'Are you sure?' } 选项用作HTML5属性，以便在单击链接时，Rails将首先向用户显示一个确认对话框，然后使用 delete 方法提交链接。这是通过JavaScript文件 rails-ujs 完成的，当您生成应用程序时，该文件会自动包含在应用程序的布局（ app/views/layouts/application.html.erb ）中。没有此文件，将不会出现确认对话框。

trans-unit.source: Here's what's going on: every Rails model can be initialized with its respective attributes, which are automatically mapped to the respective database columns. In the first line we do just that (remember that params[:article] contains the attributes we're interested in). Then, @article.save is responsible for saving the model in the database. Finally, we redirect the user to the show action, which we'll define later.
trans-unit.target: 这是怎么回事：每个Rails模型都可以使用其各自的属性进行初始化，这些属性会自动映射到各自的数据库列。在第一行中，我们只是这样做（请记住 params[:article] 包含我们感兴趣的属性）。然后， @article.save 负责将模型保存在数据库中。最后，我们将用户重定向到 show 动作，稍后将对其进行定义。

trans-unit.source: Highlights one or more phrases everywhere in text by inserting it into a :highlighter string. The highlighter can be specialized by passing :highlighter as a single-quoted string with \1 where the phrase is to be inserted (defaults to '<mark>1</mark>') or passing a block that receives each matched term. By default text is sanitized to prevent possible XSS attacks. If the input is trustworthy, passing false for :sanitize will turn sanitizing off.
trans-unit.target: 将一个或多个 phrases 插入 :highlighter 字符串中，以突出显示 text 的任何位置。可以通过 :highlighter 作为带有 \1 的单引号字符串来传递突出显示，以在其中插入短语（默认为'<mark> 1 </ mark>'）或传递一个接收每个匹配项的块。默认情况下，对 text 进行清理以防止可能的XSS攻击。如果输入是可信任的，则为 :sanitize 传递false 将关闭消毒功能。

trans-unit.source: However, classic mode infers file names from missing constant names (underscore), whereas zeitwerk mode infers constant names from file names (camelize). These helpers are not always inverse of each other, in particular if acronyms are involved. For instance, "FOO".underscore is "foo", but "foo".camelize is "Foo", not "FOO".
trans-unit.target: 但是， classic 模式从缺少的常量名（ underscore ）中推断出文件名，而 zeitwerk 模式从文件名（ camelize ）中推断出常量名。这些助手并不总是彼此相反，特别是当涉及首字母缩写词时。例如， "FOO".underscore 是 "foo" ，但是 "foo".camelize 是 "Foo" 而不是 "FOO" 。

trans-unit.source: However, it's important to note that query caches are created at the start of an action and destroyed at the end of that action and thus persist only for the duration of the action. If you'd like to store query results in a more persistent fashion, you can with low level caching.
trans-unit.target: 然而,需要注意的是,查询缓存是在操作开始时创建的,并在操作结束时销毁,因此只在操作的持续时间内持久化。如果你想以更持久的方式存储查询结果,你可以使用低级缓存。

trans-unit.source: However, the attacker may also take over the account by changing the e-mail address. After they change it, they will go to the forgotten-password page and the (possibly new) password will be mailed to the attacker's e-mail address. As a countermeasure require the user to enter the password when changing the e-mail address, too.
trans-unit.target: 但是，攻击者也可能通过更改电子邮件地址来接管帐户。更改密码后，他们将转到“忘记密码”页面，密码（可能是新密码）将被邮寄到攻击者的电子邮件地址。作为对策，在更改电子邮件地址时也要求用户输入密码。

trans-unit.source: However, there are examples where this strategy doesn't make sense. For example, suppose a person has many projects, and each project has many tasks. If we deleted one of a person's tasks, we would probably not want the project to be deleted. In this scenario, the delete method won't actually work: it can only be used if the association on the join model is a belongs_to. In other situations you are expected to perform operations directly on either the associated records or the :through association.
trans-unit.target: 但是，在某些示例中，这种策略没有意义。例如，假设一个人有许多项目，而每个项目有许多任务。如果我们删除一个人的任务之一，我们可能不希望该项目被删除。在这种情况下，delete方法实际上将不起作用：仅当联接模型上的关联是一个Emirates_to时才可以使用它。在其他情况下，您应该直接在关联的记录或 :through 关联上执行操作。

trans-unit.source: However, there is one important caveat: A scope will always return an ActiveRecord::Relation object, even if the conditional evaluates to false, whereas a class method, will return nil. This can cause NoMethodError when chaining class methods with conditionals, if any of the conditionals return false.
trans-unit.target: 但是，有一个重要警告：作用域将始终返回 ActiveRecord::Relation 对象，即使条件求值为 false ，而类方法将返回 nil 。如果任何条件 NoMethodError 返回 false ，则在将类方法与条件语句链接时，这可能导致NoMethodError。

trans-unit.source: However, what most web application designers neglect, are the forgot-password pages. These pages often admit that the entered user name or e-mail address has (not) been found. This allows an attacker to compile a list of user names and brute-force the accounts.
trans-unit.target: 然而,大多数网络应用程序设计者忽略的是忘记密码的页面。这些页面通常承认输入的用户名或电子邮件地址已经(没有)被找到。这使得攻击者可以编制一个用户名列表,并粗暴地强迫账户。

trans-unit.source: I18n support in Ruby on Rails was introduced in the release 2.2 and is still evolving. The project follows the good Ruby on Rails development tradition of evolving solutions in gems and real applications first, and only then cherry-picking the best-of-breed of most widely useful features for inclusion in the core.
trans-unit.target: 在Ruby on Rails的2.2版本中引入了对I18n的支持,并且仍在不断发展。该项目遵循Ruby on Rails良好的开发传统,即先在gems和实际应用中开发解决方案,然后再挑选最广泛有用的功能纳入核心。

trans-unit.source: IF YOU DON'T USE A PROXY, THIS MAKES YOU VULNERABLE TO IP SPOOFING. This middleware assumes that there is at least one proxy sitting around and setting headers with the client's remote IP address. If you don't use a proxy, because you are hosted on e.g. Heroku without SSL, any client can claim to have any IP address by setting the X-Forwarded-For header. If you care about that, then you need to explicitly drop or ignore those headers sometime before this middleware runs.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不使用代理，这将使您容易遭受IP欺骗。该中间件假定至少有一个代理坐在附近并使用客户端的远程IP地址设置标头。如果您不使用代理，因为您托管在例如Heroku上而没有SSL，则任何客户端都可以通过设置X-Forwarded-For标头声明拥有任何IP地址。如果您对此有所关注，则需要在此中间件运行之前的某个时间显式删除或忽略这些标头。

trans-unit.source: Identical to Ruby's clone method. This is a “shallow” copy. Be warned that your attributes are not copied. That means that modifying attributes of the clone will modify the original, since they will both point to the same attributes hash. If you need a copy of your attributes hash, please use the dup method.
trans-unit.target: 与Ruby的clone方法相同。这是“浅”副本。警告您的属性不会被复制。这意味着修改克隆的属性将修改原始属性，因为它们都指向相同的属性哈希。如果您需要属性哈希的副本，请使用dup方法。

The solution is simple: make sure that you have only one call to render or redirect in a single code path. One thing that can help is and return. Here's a patched version of the method:

trans-unit.source: If ENV["PARALLEL_WORKERS"] is set the workers argument will be ignored and the environment variable will be used instead. This is useful for CI environments, or other environments where you may need more workers than you do for local testing.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了 ENV["PARALLEL_WORKERS"] 则会忽略worker参数，而改用环境变量。这对于CI环境或其他您可能需要比本地测试更多工作人员的环境很有用。

trans-unit.source: If Hotel::Services is known by the time app/models/hotel/geo_location.rb is being loaded, Services is resolved by Ruby because Hotel belongs to the nesting when the singleton class of Hotel::GeoLocation is opened.
trans-unit.target: 如果在加载 app/models/hotel/geo_location.rb 时已知 Hotel::Services ，则 Services 将由Ruby解析，因为打开 Hotel::GeoLocation 的单例类时， Hotel 属于嵌套。

trans-unit.source: If MyEngine is isolated, The routes above will point to MyEngine::ArticlesController. You also don't need to use longer URL helpers like my_engine_articles_path. Instead, you should simply use articles_path, like you would do with your main application.
trans-unit.target: 如果 MyEngine 被隔离，则上述路由将指向 MyEngine::ArticlesController 。您也不需要使用更长的URL帮助器，例如 my_engine_articles_path 。相反，您应该像使用主应用程序一样简单地使用 articles_path 。

trans-unit.source: If User is autoloaded before reaching the require, app/models/user.rb runs again because load does not update $LOADED_FEATURES.
trans-unit.target: 如果在达到 require 之前自动加载了 User ，则 app/models/user.rb 将再次运行，因为 load 不会更新 $LOADED_FEATURES 。

trans-unit.source: If User is missing, in either case all Rails knows is that a constant called "User" was missing in a module called "Admin".
trans-unit.target: 如果缺少 User ,则无论哪种情况，Rails都知道在名为“ Admin”的模块中缺少名为“ User”的常量。

trans-unit.source: If args is provided as a Hash, a parameterized email is matched.
trans-unit.target: 如果 args 作为Hash提供，则匹配参数化的电子邮件。

trans-unit.source: If autoload_paths has a file called admin.rb Rails is going to load that one, but if there's no such file and a directory called admin is found, Rails creates an empty module and assigns it to the Admin constant on the fly.
trans-unit.target: 如果 autoload_paths 有一个名为 admin.rb 的文件，Rails将会加载该文件，但是如果没有这样的文件，并且找到了一个名为 admin 的目录，Rails会创建一个空模块并将其动态分配给 Admin 常量。

trans-unit.source: If candidates collection is not given, method returns true.
trans-unit.target: 如果未提供 candidates 集合，则方法返回true。

trans-unit.source: If config.action_dispatch.encrypted_cookie_salt and config.action_dispatch.encrypted_signed_cookie_salt are both set, legacy cookies encrypted with HMAC AES-256-CBC will be transparently upgraded.
trans-unit.target: 如果同时设置了 config.action_dispatch.encrypted_cookie_salt 和 config.action_dispatch.encrypted_signed_cookie_salt ，则将使用HMAC AES-256-CBC加密的旧Cookie进行透明升级。

trans-unit.source: If config.relative_url_root is specified, all assets will have that root prepended.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了 config.relative_url_root ，则所有资产都将以该根作为前缀。

trans-unit.source: If element is in the queue, remove and return it, or nil.
trans-unit.target: 如果 element 在队列中，请删除并返回它，或 nil 。

trans-unit.target: 如果 f 是 ActionView::Helpers::FormBuilder 的实例，则将呈现 form 部分，将部分对象设置为表单生成器。如果表单生成器是类的 LabellingFormBuilder 那么 labelling_form 部分将改为呈现。

trans-unit.target: 如果 file 是包含注释的文件的文件名，则此方法返回带有单个条目的哈希，该哈希将 file 映射到其注释的数组。否则，它将返回一个空哈希。

trans-unit.source: If message is a proc, it will be called, allowing for things like Time.now to be used within an error.
trans-unit.target: 如果 message 是一个proc，它将被调用，从而允许在错误内使用 Time.now 之类的东西。

trans-unit.source: If message is a symbol, it will be translated using the appropriate scope (see generate_message).
trans-unit.target: 如果 message 是一个符号，它将使用适当的范围进行翻译（请参见 generate_message ）。

trans-unit.source: If options has a :tag flag, it will be passed to each annotation's to_s.
trans-unit.target: 如果 options 具有 :tag 标志，它将被传递到每个注释的 to_s 。

trans-unit.target: 如果 options 具有标志 :tag ,则标签如上例所示。否则，字符串仅包含行和文本。

trans-unit.source: If options[:env] is specified, the line is appended to the corresponding file in config/environments.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定 options[:env] ，则该行将附加到 config/environments 中的相应文件。

trans-unit.source: If selected is specified as a Proc, those members of the collection that return true for the anonymous function are the selected values.
trans-unit.target: 如果将 selected 指定为Proc，则集合中为匿名函数返回true的那些成员就是所选值。

trans-unit.source: If selected is specified as a value or array of values, the element(s) returning a match on value_method will be selected option tag(s).
trans-unit.target: 如果将 selected 指定为一个值或值数组，则在 value_method 上返回匹配项的元素将成为选项标签。

trans-unit.target: 如果 since 或 ago 跳转至不能表达的时间 Time 一个 DateTime 改为返回的对象。

trans-unit.source: If tag is nil, annotations with either default or registered tags are printed.
trans-unit.target: 如果 tag 为 nil ，则打印带有默认或已注册标签的注释。

trans-unit.source: If timeout is given, block if there is no element available, waiting up to timeout seconds for an element to become available.
trans-unit.target: 如果给出了 timeout ，则在没有可用元素的情况下阻塞，等待 timeout 秒数以使元素变为可用。

trans-unit.source: If timeout is not given, remove and return the head the queue if the number of available elements is strictly greater than the number of threads currently waiting (that is, don't jump ahead in line). Otherwise, return nil.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有给出 timeout ，如果可用元素的数量严格大于当前等待的线程数量（即，不要向前跳），则删除并返回队列的开头。否则，返回 nil 。

trans-unit.source: If try is called without arguments it yields the receiver to a given block unless it is nil:
trans-unit.target: 如果在没有参数的情况下调用 try ,除非它为 nil ,否则它将使接收者进入给定的块：

trans-unit.source: If value is a callable object it must expect one or two arguments. Depending on the arity, the callable is invoked with the options hash as first argument with key as :root, and key singularized as second argument. Its return value becomes a new node.
trans-unit.target: 如果 value 是一个可调用对象，则必须包含一个或两个参数。根据Arity的不同，调用callable时将 options hash作为第一个参数，将 key 作为 :root ，并将 key 单独化为第二个参数。它的返回值成为一个新节点。

trans-unit.source: If value is a callable object it must expect one or two arguments. Depending on the arity, the callable is invoked with the options hash as first argument with key as :root, and key singularized as second argument. The callable can add nodes by using options[:builder].
trans-unit.target: 如果 value 是一个可调用对象，则必须包含一个或两个参数。根据Arity的不同，调用callable时将 options hash作为第一个参数，将 key 作为 :root ，并将 key 单独化为第二个参数。可调用对象可以使用 options[:builder] 添加节点。

trans-unit.source: If value is a hash there's a recursive call with key as :root.
trans-unit.target: 如果 value 是一个哈希值，则存在一个 key 为 :root 的递归调用。

trans-unit.source: If value is an array there's a recursive call with key as :root, and key singularized as :children.
trans-unit.target: 如果 value 是一个数组，则有一个递归调用， key 为 :root ，而 key 单数为 :children 。

trans-unit.source: If value responds to to_xml the method is invoked with key as :root.
trans-unit.target: 如果 value 响应 to_xml 方法被调用， key 为 :root 。

trans-unit.source: If verify_authenticity_token was run (indicating that we have forgery protection enabled for this request) then also verify that we aren't serving an unauthorized cross-origin response.
trans-unit.target: 如果运行了 verify_authenticity_token （表明我们已为此请求启用了伪造保护），则还要确认我们没有提供未经授权的跨域响应。

trans-unit.source: If workers is set to :number_of_processors, the number of workers will be set to the actual core count on the machine you are on.
trans-unit.target: 如果 workers 设置为 :number_of_processors ，那么worker的数量将设置为您所在计算机上的实际核心数。

trans-unit.source: If n is not specified or is nil, 16 is assumed. It may be larger in the future.
trans-unit.target: 如果n未指定或为 nil ，则假定为16。将来可能会更大。

trans-unit.source: If A extends ActiveRecord::Base, A.base_class will return A. If B descends from A through some arbitrarily deep hierarchy, B.base_class will return A.

The idea of Response Splitting is to inject two CRLFs into a header field, followed by another response with malicious HTML. The response will be:

trans-unit.source: If Rails doesn't recognize the command, it hands the reins over to Rake to run a task of the same name.
trans-unit.target: 如果Rails不识别该命令,它就会把缰绳交给Rake来运行同名的任务。

trans-unit.source: If a before_* callback cancels the action a ROLLBACK is issued. You can also trigger a ROLLBACK raising an exception in any of the callbacks, including after_* hooks. Note, however, that in that case the client needs to be aware of it because an ordinary #save will raise such exception instead of quietly returning false.
trans-unit.target: 如果 before_* 回调取消了该操作，则会发出ROLLBACK。您还可以触发ROLLBACK在任何回调中引发异常，包括 after_* 挂钩。但是请注意，在这种情况下，客户端需要意识到这一点，因为普通的#save会引发此类异常，而不是悄悄地返回 false 。

trans-unit.source: If a before_* callback throws :abort, all the later callbacks and the associated action are cancelled. Callbacks are generally run in the order they are defined, with the exception of callbacks defined as methods on the model, which are called last.
trans-unit.target: 如果 before_* 回调引发 :abort ，则所有后来的回调和关联的动作都将被取消。回调通常按定义的顺序运行，但定义为模型上方法的回调除外，这些回调称为last。

trans-unit.source: If a before_add callback throws an exception, the object does not get added to the collection. Similarly, if a before_remove callback throws an exception, the object does not get removed from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 如果 before_add 回调引发异常，则不会将该对象添加到集合中。同样，如果 before_remove 回调引发异常，则不会从集合中删除该对象。

trans-unit.source: If this were to occur in a "child" thread, with a waiting parent inside the Executor, it would cause an unavoidable deadlock: the reload must occur before the child thread is executed, but it cannot be safely performed while the parent thread is mid-execution. Child threads should use the Executor instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果这种情况发生在一个 "子 "线程中,在Executor内部有一个等待的父线程,就会造成不可避免的死锁:重载必须在子线程执行之前发生,但在父线程处于执行中期时不能安全地执行。子线程应该使用Executor代替。

trans-unit.source: If true, always save the associated object or destroy it if marked for destruction, when saving the parent object. If false, never save or destroy the associated object. By default, only save the associated object if it's a new record.
trans-unit.target: 如果为真,在保存父对象时,总是保存关联对象,如果标记为销毁,则销毁关联对象。如果为假,则从不保存或销毁关联对象。默认情况下,只有当关联对象是一条新记录时,才会保存它。

trans-unit.source: If true, always save the associated objects or destroy them if marked for destruction, when saving the parent object. If false, never save or destroy the associated objects. By default, only save associated objects that are new records.
trans-unit.target: 如果为真,在保存父对象时,总是保存关联对象,如果标记为销毁,则销毁关联对象。如果为假,则从不保存或销毁关联对象。默认情况下,只保存属于新记录的关联对象。

trans-unit.source: If true, always save the associated objects or destroy them if marked for destruction, when saving the parent object. If false, never save or destroy the associated objects. By default, only save associated objects that are new records. This option is implemented as a before_save callback. Because callbacks are run in the order they are defined, associated objects may need to be explicitly saved in any user-defined before_save callbacks.
trans-unit.target: 如果为true，则在保存父对象时，始终保存关联的对象或在标记为要销毁的情况下销毁它们。如果为false，则永远不要保存或销毁关联的对象。默认情况下，仅保存作为新记录的关联对象。此选项实现为 before_save 回调。因为回调是按照定义的顺序运行的，所以关联的对象可能需要显式保存在任何用户定义的 before_save 回调中。

trans-unit.source: If true, destroys any members from the attributes hash with a _destroy key and a value that evaluates to true (eg. 1, '1', true, or 'true'). This option is off by default.
trans-unit.target: 如果为true，则使用 _destroy 键和一个值为 true 的值（例如1，“ 1”，true或“ true”）从属性哈希中销毁任何成员。默认情况下，此选项是关闭的。

trans-unit.source: If true, the associated object will be touched (the updated_at/on attributes set to current time) when this record is either saved or destroyed. If you specify a symbol, that attribute will be updated with the current time in addition to the updated_at/on attribute. Please note that with touching no validation is performed and only the after_touch, after_commit and after_rollback callbacks are executed.
trans-unit.target: 如果为true，则在保存或销毁此记录时，将触摸关联的对象（将updated_at / on属性设置为当前时间）。如果指定符号，则除了updated_at / on属性外，该属性还将使用当前时间进行更新。请注意，触摸时不执行任何验证，仅执行 after_touch ， after_commit 和 after_rollback 回调。

trans-unit.source: If using dependent: :destroy on a scoped association, only the scoped objects are destroyed. For example, if a Post model defines has_many :comments, -> { where published: true }, dependent: :destroy and destroy is called on a post, only published comments are destroyed. This means that any unpublished comments in the database would still contain a foreign key pointing to the now deleted post.
trans-unit.target: 如果在作用域关联上使用 dependent: :destroy ，则只会破坏作用域对象。例如，如果在帖子模型上定义了 has_many :comments, -> { where published: true }, dependent: :destroy 和 destroy ，则仅销毁已发布的注释。这意味着数据库中任何未发布的评论仍将包含指向当前已删除帖子的外键。

trans-unit.source: If you are using XHR requests other than GET or POST and redirecting after the request then some browsers will follow the redirect using the original request method. trans-unit.target: 如果您正在使用GET或POST以外的XHR请求，并在请求之后进行重定向，则某些浏览器将使用原始请求方法来遵循重定向。这可能会导致不良行为，例如双重DELETE。要解决此问题，您可以返回 303 See Other 状态代码，然后使用GET请求进行处理。

trans-unit.source: If you create a has_and_belongs_to_many association, you need to explicitly create the joining table. Unless the name of the join table is explicitly specified by using the :join_table option, Active Record creates the name by using the lexical order of the class names. So a join between author and book models will give the default join table name of "authors_books" because "a" outranks "b" in lexical ordering.
trans-unit.target: 如果创建 has_and_belongs_to_many 关联，则需要显式创建联接表。除非使用 :join_table 选项显式指定联接表的名称，否则Active Record将使用类名称的词法顺序来创建名称。因此，作者和书本模型之间的联接将给出默认的联接表名称“ authors_books”，因为在词法顺序中“ a”比“ b”高。

trans-unit.source: If you decide to define Rake tasks, runners, or initializers in an application other than Rails.application, then you must run them manually.
trans-unit.target: 如果决定在 Rails.application 以外的应用程序中定义Rake任务，运行程序或初始化程序，则必须手动运行它们。

trans-unit.source: If you decide to define multiple applications, then the first application that is initialized will be set to Rails.application, unless you override it with a different application.
trans-unit.target: 如果您决定定义多个应用程序，那么除非您使用其他应用程序覆盖它，否则第一个初始化的应用程序将被设置为 Rails.application 。

trans-unit.source: If you define default_url_options in ApplicationController, as in the example above, these defaults will be used for all URL generation. The method can also be defined in a specific controller, in which case it only affects URLs generated there.
trans-unit.target: 如果如上例中那样在 ApplicationController 中定义 default_url_options ，则这些默认值将用于所有URL生成。该方法也可以在特定的控制器中定义，在这种情况下，它仅影响在此生成的URL。
